revtext: My mother recently ordered her wig and she is very satisfied with the product.   We are so happy too to see her in her new look.   Thank you very much for this.   She needed it!
revreply: Your review and comments has made our day.   It is a great feeling to be appreciated and it is more so when we make a   difference in someone's lives.   Our product has not only made her feel happy but has brought happiness to all   of you and that is the icing.   May God Bless her and all of you for taking such good care of her and her well   being
